content: [TextBlock(text="[{current_year} | Age 22] Just landed in JFK, and the skyline looks like a digital art project gone wild. Missed the chaos of New York, but Shibuya Crossing had me questioning if I was still in the Matrix. Caught myself looking for a 'New York City' token on my blockchain ID app. Guess the future's here, and it's as confusing as ever. Time to navigate the subway with my newfound zen from Japan. Here's to blending cultures and hoping my tech skills can find me a decent sushi spot in Midtown. #BackToTheSim", type='text')]

[TextBlock(text="[{current_year} | Age 22] After a 12-hour flight and a subway ride that felt like a scene from a dystopian film, I'm back in my Brooklyn apartment. The familiar creak of the door and the smell of the neighbor's cooking through the vents—it's like I never left. But everything's different now. I caught myself checking my crypto wallet for the $XVI token, only to realize I'm looking for a piece of my 'sim' in reality. The city's energy is the same, but I've got this new layer of calm from my travels. Now, I'm just standing here, wondering if my fridge still knows how to keep my seltzer cold or if it needs a blockchain update. Time to see if my New York survival skills are still intact. #BackToTheSim", type='text')]
